Package com.metal.kit.vapor.characters

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.metal.kit.vapor.characters.Character
com.metal.kit.vapor.characters.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Playable
public class Player extends Character
Represents the player in the game. This class extends Character and adds specific features such as inventory management, score tracking, and player actions (movement, attacking).

The player can attack enemies, move around the map, and interact with objects through their inventory. The character's animation is managed based on their movement or idle state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name, float x, float y, int hp, int attackPower, float speed, int score)
      Constructs a player with basic parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player
      x - The initial X position of the player
      y - The initial Y position of the player
      hp - The initial health points of the player
      attackPower - The attack power of the player
      speed - The movement speed of the player
      score - The initial score of the player.

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public void attack(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Enemy> enemies, com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound shootSound)
      Performs an attack on enemies within the player's attack range. If an enemy is within range, it is eliminated, and the player's score increases.
      Specified by:
      attack in interface Playable
      Overrides:
      attack in class Character
      Parameters:
      enemies - The list of enemies that can be attacked
      shootSound - The sound played when the attack is executed

    • update

      public void update(float delta, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map)
      Updates the player's state, including animations and movement. This method is called on each frame to handle player behavior (animation, movement).
      Overrides:
      update in class Character
      Parameters:
      delta - The time elapsed since the last update
      map - The game map used for collision handling

    • move

      public void move(float delta, com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map)
      Moves the player based on the direction keys pressed. Movement is handled with collision checks to avoid moving through obstacles.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Playable
      Overrides:
      move in class Character
      Parameters:
      delta - The time elapsed since the last update
      map - The game map used to check for collisions

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns the player's current score. The score increases each time an enemy is killed.
